definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: "I've lost her, " said the Prince, and he returned sadly to the palace.
sentences.chinese: “我把她給追丟了，”王子傷心地回了王宮。

sentences.english: Standing there in the office, miserable, I wanted to vanish into the paneling.
sentences.chinese: 我傷心地站在辦公室門口，恨不得消失在門縫裏。

sentences.english: He examined the old knight and shook his head sadly.
sentences.chinese: 診察了這位老武士之後，傷心地搖搖頭。

sentences.english: Camp David and the Eastern region in which naval business center is located in Lushun.
sentences.chinese: 而東方戴維營所處的水師營區域位於旅順的中心地帶。

sentences.english: He too was went away disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 這位王子也十分傷心地離開了。

sentences.english: The house is in a central location with good access to the shops.
sentences.chinese: 這幢房子位於中心地段，離商店比較近。

sentences.english: Dad sadly evergreen victory, for it to re-earth.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸傷心地捧起萬年青，重新爲它培土。

sentences.english: The old lady at the desk leered at her knowingly.
sentences.chinese: 辦公桌旁的老太婆會心地斜睨了她一眼。

sentences.english: Our monitor is a person who is pure in heart.
sentences.chinese: 我們的班長是個心地純潔的人。

sentences.english: She takes good care of her children and keeps them all at school.
sentences.chinese: 她細心地照顧孩子並使他們都上學讀書。

sentences.english: Tom seems rather mean, but he has a kind heart.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆看上去挺小氣，但心地善良。

sentences.english: Victorian College of The Arts (VCA), University of Melbourne, is located in Southbank, the heart of the arts precinct in Melbourne.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞藝術學院坐落在墨爾本藝術區的中心地帶。

sentences.english: The doctor felt the pulse carefully.
He is a kind and efficient man.
sentences.chinese: 王總是一個心地善良，很講效率的人。

sentences.english: She had a good heart, a beautiful face, and a golden star on her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她心地善良，美麗可愛，額頭上還有一顆金色的星星。

sentences.english: The village of Bardai is an oasis in the heart of the Sahara Desert.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾達伊村莊是撒哈拉沙漠中心地帶的一個綠洲。

definition: to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
